verses.name: Romans 3:22
verses.text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:

verses.name: Romans 3:23
verses.text: For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;

verses.name: Romans 3:24
verses.text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:

verses.name: Romans 3:25
verses.text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God;
